com.giisoo.core.mq

类 MQ

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.giisoo.core.mq.MQ

  • public final class MQ
extends Object
    the distribute message system,
    the performance: sending 1w/300ms
    recving 1w/1500ms
    作者:
    joe

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  MQ.Mode
      the message stub type
      TOPIC: all stub will read it
      QUEUE: only one will read it
      static class  MQ.Receiver
      QueueTask
